#include<stdio.h>
int hcf(int num1,int num2)
{if(num2==0)
return num1;
else
 hcf(num2,num1%num2);
}
int lcm(int num1,int num2)
{return num1*num2/hcf(num1,num2);}

int main()
{
int n,i = 0,num,den,h = 1,l = 1;
scanf("%d",&n);
scanf("%d %d",&num,&den);
l = den;
h = num;
for(i = 1;i < n;i++)
{
scanf("%d %d",&num,&den);
h = hcf(h,num);
l = lcm(l,den);
}
num = h;
den = l;
h = hcf(num,den);
printf("%d/%d\n",(num/h),(den/h));
// getch();
return 0;
}
